title: 07/05/21 DPS Best of
itunes:title: 07/05/21 DPS Best of
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, react to a major story in sports media and give perspective as to why a prominent sports personality is in hot water. Should there be a mental asterisk on this year's NBA champion? Ryan explains why he doesn't trust Mike Budenholzer to bring success to the Bucks. Henry Abbott of True Hoop joins the guys to discuss all aspects of the Finals and look at what is setting Chris Paul apart this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
